tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protocol_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_date DATE,
  research_findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_protocols (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  protocol_name STRING,
  researcher_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_findings (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  protocol_id UUID REFERENCES experimental_protocols(id),
  finding_description STRING,
  result FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_design (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT,
    protocol_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (protocol_id) REFERENCES protocol(protocol_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    researcher_id INT,
    design_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researcher(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES experimental_design(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    result_name VARCHAR(255),
    observations TEXT,
    experiment_id INT,
    data BLOB,
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment(experiment_id)
);
